message: A lengthy investigation spanning three states ended with the arrest of four women accused of pimping and pandering. Authorities seized tens of thousands of dollars of cash and froze bank accounts totaling more than $300,000.

data.description: A lengthy investigation spanning three states ended with the arrest of four women accused of pimping and pandering under the guise of an escort service. According to authorities…
data.title: OCDA: Four Women Face Pimping Charges for Roles in High-End Escort Service | OC Weekly
